docs: the spa on the roof top inviting and relaxing .the service is very quick and of high quality ( starting with the bell boy up to the concierge . </DOC> very helpful concierge who organised great trips .staff friendly and helpfulcentrally located , friendly staff ; rooms are nice and clean .nothing special but comfortable .the good thing is that they do offer parking and that your pets are welcome . </DOC> he was very friendly so it was n’t too difficult , albeit unnecessary , to wait .this hotel has great service , wonderful breakfasts ( sit outside and enjoy the piano playing ) and helpful staff .the hotel 's desk staff was always very helpful and friendly .staff is very polite and helpful and good english knowledge .wifi was very fast , equal to the speed at home . </DOC> the staff were all friendly and helpful .all the staff were great from check in , cleaners and even the airport shuttle guy arranged through the hotel .the breakfast was good with great service .the breakfast staff were lovely and worked very hard .premisis : fairly new look and feel , but above all efficient . </DOC> general was a good experience !all staff spoke english well .hotel 's good , all staff is friendly and very well organized .breakfast is a delight and check out procedures are efficient .but i did n't find the hotel to be depressing at all . </DOC> staff very friendly .breakfast was amazing each day .different kind of towels and toiletries were left .the staff was friendly and helpful .personnel super nice and helpful . </DOC> service is polite , but not overly talkative ; the desk staff will handle requests in english , but it 's not like chatty america .the included breakfast is a full breakfast , and has nice breads , though i do n't suggest the bacon .the breakfast , staff and wifi are all good .staff was very polite and cooperative , good variety in breakfast , clean rooms as well .the bar was decent , the breakfast good . </DOC> breakfast was very good and included in price , but was a little chaotic at 8:00 .the staff in the hotel reception spoke good english and were very helpful .this is without question the most incompetent shower situations of any business hotelon the brighter side , the wifi worked consistently well during my stay . smoking and non - smoking floors are interleaved such that my non - smoking room had a strong smell of smoke most of the time .while most of the staff was great , the older gentleman who seems to be the reception manager is so gruff and charmless as to create a very bad impression for the hotel overall .
